column1: 95486586$Elemental HERO Core$Unlimited$EARTH$[Warrior/Fusion/Effect]$$$$$9$2700$2200$$3 "Elemental HERO" monsters$$Must be Fusion Summoned and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card battled: You can target 1 monster on the field
column2: destroy it. When this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can target 1 Level 8 or lower "Elemental HERO" Fusion Monster in your Graveyard
column3: Special Summon it, ignoring its Summoning conditions.$Fusion Monster$$$Summon/Trigger$

column1: 71696014$Magician's Robe$Unlimited$DARK$[Spellcaster/Effect]$$$$$2$700$2000$$$$During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can discard 1 Spell/Trap
